Package org.apache.heron.packing

Class CommonPackingTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.packing.CommonPackingTests
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstFitDecreasingPackingTest, ResourceCompliantRRPackingTest, RoundRobinPackingTest
    public abstract class CommonPackingTests
extends java.lang.Object
    There is some common functionality in multiple packing plans. This class contains common tests.

      • doPackingAndScalingTest

        protected PackingPlan doPackingAndScalingTest​(TopologyAPI.Topology testTopology,
                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> componentChanges,
                                              Resource boltRes,
                                              int testBoltParallelism,
                                              Resource spoutRes,
                                              int testSpoutParallelism,
                                              int numContainersBeforeRepack,
                                              int numContainersAfterRepack,
                                              Resource maxContainerResource)
        Performs a scaling test for a specific topology. It first computes an initial packing plan as a basis for scaling. Given specific component parallelism changes, a new packing plan is produced.
        Parameters:
        testTopology - Input topology
        componentChanges - parallelism changes for scale up/down
        boltRes - RAM allocated to bolts
        testBoltParallelism - bolt parallelism
        spoutRes - RAM allocated to spouts
        testSpoutParallelism - spout parallelism
        numContainersBeforeRepack - number of containers that the initial packing plan should use
        numContainersAfterRepack - number of instances expected before scaling
        Returns:
        the new packing plan
